createPickRay

public void createPickRay(int x,
                          int y,
                          javax.vecmath.Point3f o,
                          javax.vecmath.Vector3f d)
Loads a world-space ray pick using the specified pixel location.

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the pixel location.
y - The y coordinate of the pixel location.
o - The Point3f that will be loaded with the ray origin.
d - The Vector3f that will be loaded with the ray direction.
